name: Bunker
overview: A shooter created by P.M. Correa, Simon Beesley and published in Your Computer Software Exchange (CBM04). The Gluks are invading the galaxy and guess who has to defend the bunker? As commander of the bunker you have to destroy the Gluk battle fleet using only two laser cannons and a shield to defend yourself. The game is fast-action machine code and an exception feature is that one of the guns moves on a diagonal slope.
